title: Linux Basics
description: Learn essential Linux commands and concepts

lessons.title: Introduction to Linux
lessons.content:
Welcome to Linux Basics! In this module, you'll learn essential Linux commands.

Linux is a powerful operating system used by many servers and security professionals.

Type 'next' to continue.

lessons.title: Finding Your Way: pwd
lessons.content:
The 'pwd' command shows your current working directory.

Try it now by typing: pwd
lessons.success_message: Great! You've learned how to find your current directory.

lessons.title: Listing Files: ls
lessons.content:
The 'ls' command lists files in the current directory.

Try it now by typing: ls
lessons.success_message: Excellent! You can now list directory contents.

lessons.title: Changing Directories: cd
lessons.content:
The 'cd' command changes directories.

Try moving to the home directory by typing: cd ~
lessons.success_message: Well done! You've learned how to navigate directories.

lessons.title: Module Complete!
lessons.content:
Congratulations! You've completed the Linux Basics module.

You've learned:
- How to view your current directory (pwd)
- How to list files (ls)
- How to navigate directories (cd)

Type 'exit' to return to the main menu.
